AddMembersToGroup.name: AddMembersToGroup
AddMembersToGroup.description: Adds a list of members (users or groups) to a group.

AssociateDelegateToResource.name: AssociateDelegateToResource
AssociateDelegateToResource.description: Adds a member (user or group) to the resource's set of delegates.

AssociateMemberToGroup.name: AssociateMemberToGroup
AssociateMemberToGroup.description: Adds a member (user or group) to the group's set.

CancelMailboxExportJob.name: CancelMailboxExportJob
CancelMailboxExportJob.description: Cancels a currently running mailbox export job.

CreateAlias.name: CreateAlias
CreateAlias.description: Adds an alias to the set of a given member (user or group) of WorkMail.

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Creates a group that can be used in WorkMail by calling the RegisterToWorkMail operation.

CreateInboundMailFlowRule.name: CreateInboundMailFlowRule
CreateInboundMailFlowRule.description: Create an inbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent to an organization

CreateMailUser.name: CreateMailUser
CreateMailUser.description:
Creates a user in the directory and the WorkMail storage but does not enable the user
                                                for mail.

CreateOrganization.name: CreateOrganization
CreateOrganization.description: Creates a new Amazon WorkMail organization.

CreateOutboundMailFlowRule.name: CreateOutboundMailFlowRule
CreateOutboundMailFlowRule.description: Create an outbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent from an organization

CreateSmtpGateway.name: CreateSmtpGateway
CreateSmtpGateway.description: Register an SMTP device against a WorkMail organization

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Creates a user who can be used in WorkMail by calling the RegisterToWorkMail operation.

DeleteAccessControlRule.name: DeleteAccessControlRule
DeleteAccessControlRule.description: Deletes an access control rule for the specified WorkMail organization.

DeleteAlias.name: DeleteAlias
DeleteAlias.description: Remove one or more specified aliases from a set of aliases for a given user.

DeleteInboundMailFlowRule.name: DeleteInboundMailFlowRule
DeleteInboundMailFlowRule.description: Remove an inbound email flow rule to no longer apply to emails sent to an organization

DeleteMailDomain.name: DeleteMailDomain
DeleteMailDomain.description: Removes an unused mail domain from an organization

DeleteMailboxPermissions.name: DeleteMailboxPermissions
DeleteMailboxPermissions.description: Deletes permissions granted to a member (user or group).

DeleteMobileDevice.name: DeleteMobileDevice
DeleteMobileDevice.description: Removes a mobile device from a user

DeleteOrganization.name: DeleteOrganization
DeleteOrganization.description:
Deletes an Amazon WorkMail organization and all underlying AWS resources managed by
                                                Amazon WorkMail as part of the organization.

DeleteOutboundMailFlowRule.name: DeleteOutboundMailFlowRule
DeleteOutboundMailFlowRule.description: Remove an outbound email flow rule to no longer apply to emails sent from an organization

DeleteRetentionPolicy.name: DeleteRetentionPolicy
DeleteRetentionPolicy.description: Deletes the retention policy based on the supplied organization and policy identifiers.

DeleteSmtpGateway.name: DeleteSmtpGateway
DeleteSmtpGateway.description: Remove an SMTP device from an organization

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Deletes a user from WorkMail and all subsequent systems. The action cannot be undone.

DeregisterFromWorkMail.name: DeregisterFromWorkMail
DeregisterFromWorkMail.description: Mark a user, group, or resource as no longer used in WorkMail.

DescribeDirectories.name: DescribeDirectories
DescribeDirectories.description: Shows a list of directories available for use in creating an organization

DescribeGroup.name: DescribeGroup
DescribeGroup.description: Returns the data available for the group.

DescribeInboundMailFlowRule.name: DescribeInboundMailFlowRule
DescribeInboundMailFlowRule.description: Returns the details of an inbound mail flow rule configured for an organization

DescribeKmsKeys.name: DescribeKmsKeys
DescribeKmsKeys.description: Shows a list of KMS Keys available for use in creating an organization

DescribeMailDomains.name: DescribeMailDomains
DescribeMailDomains.description: Shows the details of all mail domains associated with the organization

DescribeMailGroups.name: DescribeMailGroups
DescribeMailGroups.description: Shows the details of all groups associated with the organization

DescribeMailUsers.name: DescribeMailUsers
DescribeMailUsers.description: Shows the details of all users associated with the orgaization

DescribeMailboxExportJob.name: DescribeMailboxExportJob
DescribeMailboxExportJob.description: Retrieve details of a mailbox export job.

DescribeOrganization.name: DescribeOrganization
DescribeOrganization.description: Provides more information regarding a given organization based on its identifier.

DescribeOrganizations.name: DescribeOrganizations
DescribeOrganizations.description: Shows a summary of all organizations associated with the account

DescribeOutboundMailFlowRule.name: DescribeOutboundMailFlowRule
DescribeOutboundMailFlowRule.description: Returns the details of an outbound mail flow rule configured for an organization

DescribeResource.name: DescribeResource
DescribeResource.description: Returns the data available for the resource.

DescribeSmtpGateway.name: DescribeSmtpGateway
DescribeSmtpGateway.description: Returns the details of an SMTP device registered against an organization

DisableMailGroups.name: DisableMailGroups
DisableMailGroups.description: Disable a mail group when it is not being used and, to allow it to be deleted

DisableMailUsers.name: DisableMailUsers
DisableMailUsers.description: Disable a user mailbox when it is no longer being used, and to allow it to be deleted

DisassociateDelegateFromResource.name: DisassociateDelegateFromResource
DisassociateDelegateFromResource.description: Removes a member from the resource's set of delegates.

DisassociateMemberFromGroup.name: DisassociateMemberFromGroup
DisassociateMemberFromGroup.description: Removes a member from a group.

EnableMailDomain.name: EnableMailDomain
EnableMailDomain.description: Enable a mail domain in the organization

EnableMailGroups.name: EnableMailGroups
EnableMailGroups.description: Enable a mail group after it has been created to allow it to receive mail

EnableMailUsers.name: EnableMailUsers
EnableMailUsers.description: Enable a user's mailbox after it has been created to allow it to receive mail

GetAccessControlEffect.name: GetAccessControlEffect
GetAccessControlEffect.description:
Gets the effects of an organization's access control rules as they apply to a specified
                                                IPv4 address, access protocol action, or user ID.

GetDefaultRetentionPolicy.name: GetDefaultRetentionPolicy
GetDefaultRetentionPolicy.description: Retrieves the retention policy associated at an organizational level.

GetJournalingRules.name: GetJournalingRules
GetJournalingRules.description: Returns journaling and fallback email addresses configured for email journaling

GetMailDomainDetails.name: GetMailDomainDetails
GetMailDomainDetails.description: Get the details of the mail domain

GetMailGroupDetails.name: GetMailGroupDetails
GetMailGroupDetails.description: Get the details of the mail group

GetMailUserDetails.name: GetMailUserDetails
GetMailUserDetails.description: Get the details of the user's mailbox and account

GetMailboxDetails.name: GetMailboxDetails
GetMailboxDetails.description: Returns the details of the user's mailbox.

GetMobileDeviceDetails.name: GetMobileDeviceDetails
GetMobileDeviceDetails.description: Get the details of the mobile device

GetMobileDevicesForUser.name: GetMobileDevicesForUser
GetMobileDevicesForUser.description: Get a list of the mobile devices associated with the user

GetMobilePolicyDetails.name: GetMobilePolicyDetails
GetMobilePolicyDetails.description: Get the details of the mobile device policy associated with the organization

ListAccessControlRules.name: ListAccessControlRules
ListAccessControlRules.description: Lists the access control rules for the specified organization.

ListAliases.name: ListAliases
ListAliases.description: Creates a paginated call to list the aliases associated with a given entity.

ListGroupMembers.name: ListGroupMembers
ListGroupMembers.description:
Returns an overview of the members of a group. Users and groups can be members of
                                                a group.

ListGroups.name: ListGroups
ListGroups.description: Returns summaries of the organization's groups.

ListInboundMailFlowRules.name: ListInboundMailFlowRules
ListInboundMailFlowRules.description: Returns a list of inbound mail flow rules configured for an organization

ListMailboxPermissions.name: ListMailboxPermissions
ListMailboxPermissions.description: Lists the mailbox permissions associated with a user, group, or resource mailbox.

ListMembersInMailGroup.name: ListMembersInMailGroup
ListMembersInMailGroup.description: Get a list of all the members in a mail group

ListOrganizations.name: ListOrganizations
ListOrganizations.description: Returns summaries of the customer's non-deleted organizations.

ListOutboundMailFlowRules.name: ListOutboundMailFlowRules
ListOutboundMailFlowRules.description: Returns a list of outbound mail flow rules configured for an organization

ListResourceDelegates.name: ListResourceDelegates
ListResourceDelegates.description: Lists the delegates associated with a resource.

ListResources.name: ListResources
ListResources.description: Returns summaries of the organization's resources.

ListSmtpGateways.name: ListSmtpGateways
ListSmtpGateways.description: Returns a list of SMTP devices registered against the organization

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags applied to an Amazon WorkMail organization resource.

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Returns summaries of the organization's users.

PutAccessControlRule.name: PutAccessControlRule
PutAccessControlRule.description:
Adds a new access control rule for the specified organization. The rule allows or
                                                denies access to the organization for the specified IPv4 addresses, access protocol
                                                actions, and user IDs. Adding a new rule with the same name as an existing rule replaces
                                                the older rule.

PutMailboxPermissions.name: PutMailboxPermissions
PutMailboxPermissions.description: Sets permissions for a user, group, or resource. This replaces any pre-existing permissions.

PutRetentionPolicy.name: PutRetentionPolicy
PutRetentionPolicy.description: Adds or updates the retention policy for the specified organization.

RegisterToWorkMail.name: RegisterToWorkMail
RegisterToWorkMail.description:
Registers an existing and disabled user, group, or resource for use by associating
                                                a mailbox and calendaring capabilities.

RemoveMembersFromGroup.name: RemoveMembersFromGroup
RemoveMembersFromGroup.description: Remove members from a mail group

ResetPassword.name: ResetPassword
ResetPassword.description: Allows the administrator to reset the password for a user.

ResetUserPassword.name: ResetUserPassword
ResetUserPassword.description: Reset the password for a user's account

SearchMembers.name: SearchMembers
SearchMembers.description: Prefix search to find a specific user in a mail group

SetAdmin.name: SetAdmin
SetAdmin.description: Mark a user as being an administrator

SetDefaultMailDomain.name: SetDefaultMailDomain
SetDefaultMailDomain.description: Set the default mail domain for the organization

SetJournalingRules.name: SetJournalingRules
SetJournalingRules.description: Set journaling and fallback email addresses for email journaling

SetMailGroupDetails.name: SetMailGroupDetails
SetMailGroupDetails.description: Set the details of the mail group which has just been created

SetMailUserDetails.name: SetMailUserDetails
SetMailUserDetails.description: Set the details for the user account which has just been created

SetMobilePolicyDetails.name: SetMobilePolicyDetails
SetMobilePolicyDetails.description: Set the details of a mobile policy associated with the organization

StartMailboxExportJob.name: StartMailboxExportJob
StartMailboxExportJob.description: Start a new mailbox export job.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified Amazon WorkMail organization resource.

TestInboundMailFlowRules.name: TestInboundMailFlowRules
TestInboundMailFlowRules.description: Test what inbound rules will apply to an email with a given sender and recipient

TestOutboundMailFlowRules.name: TestOutboundMailFlowRules
TestOutboundMailFlowRules.description: Test what outbound rules will apply to an email with a given sender and recipient

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified Amazon WorkMail organization resource.

UpdateInboundMailFlowRule.name: UpdateInboundMailFlowRule
UpdateInboundMailFlowRule.description:
Update the details of an inbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent
                                                to an organization

UpdateMailboxQuota.name: UpdateMailboxQuota
UpdateMailboxQuota.description: Updates the maximum size (in MB) of the user's mailbox.

UpdateOutboundMailFlowRule.name: UpdateOutboundMailFlowRule
UpdateOutboundMailFlowRule.description:
Update the details of an outbound email flow rule which will apply to all email sent
                                                from an organization

UpdatePrimaryEmailAddress.name: UpdatePrimaryEmailAddress
UpdatePrimaryEmailAddress.description: Updates the primary email for a user, group, or resource.

UpdateResource.name: UpdateResource
UpdateResource.description:
Updates data for the resource. To retrieve the latest information, it must be preceded
                                                by a DescribeResource call.

UpdateSmtpGateway.name: UpdateSmtpGateway
UpdateSmtpGateway.description: Update the details of an existing SMTP device registered against an organization

WipeMobileDevice.name: WipeMobileDevice
WipeMobileDevice.description: Remotely wipe the mobile device associated with a user's account
